question: Which of the following is true about ASI(Archaeological Survey of India)? 1. ASI was formed in 1866. 2. ASI is premier organization under the Ministry of Culture. 3. Maintenance of ancient monuments and archaeological sites is the prime concern of ASI.
explanation: ASI was formed in 1861.The Archaeological Survey of India is under the Ministry of Culture. The Maintenance of ancient monuments and archaeological sites is the prime concern of ASI.
